titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Günter Schmölders papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Sally DeBauche

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-04-17T13:40-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: Correspondence, speeches and writings, conference papers, minutes, reports, financial records, and printed matter relating to economic theory, monetary policy, and economic research foundations in West Germany.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Günter Schmölders papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1985.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: 1921-1926: Studied Sociology and Economics at the Universität zu Berlin and the Universität Tübingen
1926: Received Doctor’s degree, Universität zu Berlin (Thesis: "Failure of Prohibition Laws in Scandinavian Countries")
1930: Author, Die Prohibition in den Vereinigten Staaten
1938: Author, Geld und Kredit. Probleme der Wirtschaftspolitik
1950-1975: Led the Finanzwissenschaftliche Forschungsinsitute at the Universität Köln
1975: Visiting Lecturer, Institute for Humane Studies, Menlo Park, California

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Consists of two main sections, this collection documents the professional career of the German economist, Günter Schmölders. The first section is comprised of 32 subsections divided according to the subject, form, or related activity of the materials. The original arrangement and order of the materials, as created by Schmölders, has been maintained wherever possible. One section of the collection that requires addtional explanation is the Universitätsarchiv Köln file. This section was originally a separate collection of Schmölders' papers housed at the Universitätsarchiv Köln, the institution where Schmölders taught and served as rector. The majority of the materials in this section date to the years that Schmölders worked at the Universität Köln, although it also contains research files compiled during his student years. These files are maintained in their original order as arranged by the Universitätsarchiv Köln. The organization is based on the date of accession of the materials to that archive, and then loosely on the subject of the materials, which are bound and labeled. These labels have been included verbatim in this finding aid.

The Biographical file is comprised primarily of newspaper clippings of interviews and articles related to Schmölders’ professional career. Also in this section is a small amount of personal correspondence related to Schmölders’ birthday and travel.

The Correspondence file is maintained in its original order as designated by Schmölders. Correspondence is organized primarily chronologically and then alphabetically by the name of the individual or organization with whom he corresponded, or the subject discussed. There is also a small portion of correspondence separate from the chronological files organized specifically by subject. This file represents Schmölders’ correspondence beginning with his position as Professor atthe Universität Köln. Some earlier correspondence can be found in the Universitätsarchiv Köln file.

The Speeches and Writings file is comprised primarily of unpublished drafts and published copies of books, articles, and papers, spanning the entirety of Schmölders’ professional career. There is also a significant collection of lecture notes created by Schmölders, which provide outlines of speeches and university lectures. This section of the collection has been arranged alphabetically by the title of the work.

Apart from these sections, which are organized by the form of the materials, there are 16 sections that are organized by Schmölders according to their original use or related activity. In most cases, materials are grouped together by the organization, institution, or committee with which they are associated, and then chronologically. Schmölders served on many advisory boards and committees in both the private and public sector, and these activities are represented in the correspondence, reports, and meeting minutes found in these sections of the collection. More detailed descriptions of the types of materials related to specific organizations can be found in the inventory itself. Of particular note is the Mont Pèlerin Society file, which partially documents Schmölders’ membership in that organization through correspondence, reports, meeting minutes, and conference programs. More materials related to the Mont Pèlerin Society can also be found in the Universitätsarchiv Köln file.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of itineraries, correspondence, printed matter, conference programs, speeches and writings, and writings by others related to a trip that Schmölders to the United States.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence relating to Schmölders' employment collected per Germany's Nebentätigkeit requirements to document additional income received as the result of secondary jobs or outside consulting work.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of newspaper and magazine clippings of articles related to Schmölders' work, organized chronologically by Schmölders in binders labeled "public relations."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence related to a job offer from the Economics Department at the University of Munich.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of typescript notes relating to meetings and conversations with various committees, organizations, and individuals, organized alphabetically by Schmölders by name or subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports, correspondence, memoranda, writings by others, conference programs, meeting minutes, and promotional materials related to the Arbeitsgemeinschaft Industrieller Forschungsvereinigungen.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports and correspondence relating to the Bankverein Werther.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of annual reports and correspondence relating to the Bund der Steuerzahler.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, reports, and meeting minutes relating to the Commerzbank - Fonds - Verwaltungsgesellschaft.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, meeting minutes, writings by others, reports, various curriculum vitae of students and colleagues, class schedules, and university newsletters, related to Schmölders' position in the Faculty of Economics at the University of Köln.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, reports, meeting minutes, and printed matter related to the Felten und Guilleaume firm, based in Köln, for which Schmölders consulted.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of surveys and reports related to the Finanzwissenschaftliche Forschungs Institut.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, reports, conference programs, and meeting minutes related to the Forschungstelle für Empirische Sozialökonomik, an organization founded by Schmölders and based at the Universität Köln.

did.unittitle: Gesellschaft zur Förderung der Finanzwissenschaftlichen Forschung file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, meeting minutes, membership lists, and newspaper clippings related to the Gesellschaft zur Förderung der Finanzwissenschaftlichen Forschung, an organization of which Schmölders was a member.

did.unittitle: Gesellschaft für Konsum-, Markt-, und Absatzforschung file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of surveys related to the Gesellschaft für Konsum-, Markt-, und Absatzforschung.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, reports, newsletters and promotional materials related to the Gothaer Versicherungsbank.

did.unittitle: Institut für Wirtschaftpolitik an der Universität zu Köln file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence and reports relating to the Institut für Wirtschaftspolitik an der Universität zu Köln, of which Schmölders was a member.

did.unittitle: International Institute of Public Finance file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports and correspondence related to the International Institute of Public Finance.

did.unittitle: Johannes Gutenberg - Universität Mainz, Studium Generale file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, writings, writings by others, and conference programs related to the Studium Generale, an interdisciplinary seminar at the Johannes Gutenberg - Universität Mainz.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, surveys, and questionaires relating to the Kienbaum Unternehmensberatung.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, memoranda, reports, meeting minutes, conference programs, membership lists, writings by others, printed matter, notes, and ephemera, related to the Mont Pèlerin Society, of which Schmölders was a member and President from 1968-1970. More materials related to the Mont Pèlerin Society can be found in the Universitätsarchiv Köln file.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports, correspondence, meeting minutes, printed matter, telephone directories, and memorabilia related to Roland Rechtschutzversicherung.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports related the the Rolu-Normenbau Aktiengesellschaft.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of symposium participant lists, correspondence, writings by Schmölders, and writings by others related to the Symposium "Wirtschaftstheorie als Verhaltenstheorie."

did.unittitle: Stiftung zur Förderung der Forschung für die gewerblichen Wirtschaft file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports, correspondence, and printed matter related to the Stiftung zur Förderung für Forschung der gewerbliche Wirtschaft.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of drafts of writings, correspondence, meeting minutes, reports, and printed matter. This section of the collection was a separate collection of Schmölders' papers housed at the Universitätsarchiv Köln, the university where Schmölders taught and served as rector. The majority of these materials date to the years that Schmölders worked at the Universität Köln, but there are also research files compiled by Schmölders during his student years. These files are maintained in their original order as arranged by the Universitätsarchiv Köln. That order is based on the accession date of the materials, and then loosely by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports, correspondence, meeting minutes, and conference programs related to the Universitäts-Seminar für empirische Sozialforschung.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, reports, meeting minutes, membership lists, and printed matter relating to various professional and social societies and organizations to which Schmölders belonged, including the German-Japanese Society of Bavaria, the Harvard Club Rhein-Ruhr, and the Society of Bibliophiles, among others. Organized alphabetically by the name of the organization by Schmölders in folders labeled "Gesellschaften, Vereine, Verbände."

did.unittitle: Verein für Sozialpolitk - Ausschuss für Finanzwissenschaft file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, meeting minutes, and printed matter related to the Verein für Sozialpolitik - Ausschuss für Finanzwissenschaft, of which Schmölders was a member.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports, correspondence, and meeting minutes relating to Schmölders' work with the Wissenschaftlicher Beirat beim Finanzministerium.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports, correspondence, memoranda, and promotional materials related to the Zentralarchiv für empirische Sozialforschung.
